algorithms.name: process the description member
algorithms.html: To process the description member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["description"] is not a string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["description"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["description"].

algorithms.name: process the app_id member
algorithms.html: To process the app_id member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["app_id"] does not exist, or if json["app_id"] is not a string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["app_id"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["app_id"].

algorithms.name: process the color_scheme member
algorithms.html: To process the color_scheme member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html:
If json["color_scheme"] does not exist,
or if json["color_scheme"] is not a string,
or if json["color_scheme"] doesn't match one of the color scheme values, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["color_scheme"] to <var data-type="JSON">json</var>["color_scheme"].

algorithms.name: process the device_type member
algorithms.html: To process the device_type member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["device_type"] does not exist, or if json["device_type"] is not a list, return.
Let device_type be a new empty list.
For each item of json["device_type"]:
If item is not a string, return.
Append item to device_type.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["device_type"] to <var data-type="list">device_type</var>.

algorithms.name: process the pages member
algorithms.html: To process the pages member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["pages"] does not exist, or if json["pages"] is not a list, return.
Let pages be a new list.
For each item of json["pages"]:
If item is not a string, return.
Let url be the result of parsing item.
If url is failure, continue.
Append pages to url.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["pages"] to <var>pages</var>.

algorithms.name: process the platform_version member
algorithms.html: To process the platform_version member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["platform_version"] does not exist, or if json["platform_version"] is not an ordered map, return.
Let platform_version be a new ordered map.
Process the platform version's min_code member passing json["platform_version"] and platform_version.
Process the platform version's target_code member passing json["platform_version"] and platform_version.
Process the platform version's release_type member passing json["platform_version"] and platform_version.
If platform_version["min_code"] does not exist, return failure.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["platform_version"] to <var data-type="ordered map">platform_version</var>.

algorithms.name: process the req_permissions member
algorithms.html: To process the req_permissions member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["req_permissions"] does not exist, or if json["req_permissions"] is not a list, return.
Let permissions be a new list.
For each item of json["req_permissions"]:
If item is not an ordered map, continue.
Let permission be an ordered map.
Process the permission resource's name member passing item and permission.
If permission["name"] does not exist, continue.
Process the permission resource's reason member passing item and permission.
Append permission to permissions.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["req_permissions"] to <var data-type="list">permissions</var>.

algorithms.name: process the version member
algorithms.html: To process the version member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["version"] does not exist, or if json["version"] is not ordered map, return.
Let version be a new ordered map.
Process the version's code member passing json["version"] and version.
Process the version's name member passing json["version"] and version.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["version"] to <var data-type="ordered map">version</var>.

algorithms.name: process the widgets member
algorithms.html: To process the widgets member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["widgets"] does not exist, or if json["widgets"] is not a list, return.
Let widgets be a new empty list.
For each item of json["widgets"]:
If item is not an ordered map, continue.
Let widget be an ordered map.
Process the widget's name member passing item and widget.
Process the widget's path member passing item and widget.
Process the widget's min_code member passing item, manifest, and widget.
If widget["name"] does not exist, or if item["path"] does not exist, continue.
Append widget to widgets.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["widgets"] to <var data-type="list">widgets</var>.

algorithms.name: process the window member
algorithms.html: To process the window member, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If json["window"] does not exist, or if json["window"] is not an ordered map, return.

Let window be a new ordered map «[ "auto_design_width" → false, "background_color" → "#ffffff", "background_text_style" → "dark", "design_width" → 750, "enable_pull_down_refresh" → false, "fullscreen" → "false", "navigation_bar_background_color" → "#000000", "navigation_bar_text_style" → "white", "navigation_bar_title_text" → "default", "on_reach_bottom_distance" → 50, "orientation" → "portrait" ]».
Process the window's auto_design_width member passing json["window"] and window.
Process a color member passing json["window"], window and "background_color".
Process the window's background_text_style member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's design_width member passing json["window"] and window
Process the window's enable_pull_down_refresh member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's fullscreen member passing json["window"] and window.
Process a color member passing json["window"], window and "navigation_bar_background_color".
Process the window's navigation_bar_text_style member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's navigation_bar_title_text member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's navigation_style member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's on_reach_bottom_distance member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's orientation member passing json["window"] and window.
Process the window's auto_design_width member passing json["window"] and window.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["window"] to <var data-type="ordered map">window</var>.

algorithms.name: processing a MiniApp manifest
algorithms.html: To process a MiniApp manifest at the extension point, given ordered map json and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: If manifest["name"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
If manifest["icons"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Let <var data-type="ordered map">icons</var> be <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["icons"].
If icons["src"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
If manifest["icons"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Process the app_id member passing json and manifest.
If manifest["app_id"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Process the color_scheme member passing json and manifest.
Process the description member passing json and manifest.
Process the device_type member passing json and manifest.
Process the pages member passing json and manifest.
If manifest["pages"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Process the platform_version member passing json and manifest.
If manifest["platform_version"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Process the req_permissions member passing json and manifest.
Process the version member passing json and manifest.
If manifest["version"] does not exist, throw a TypeError.
Process the widgets member passing json and manifest.
Process the window member passing json and manifest.

algorithms.name: process the platform version's min_code member
algorithms.html: To process the platform version's min_code member, given ordered map json and ordered map platform_version:

steps.html: If json["min_code"] does not exist, or if json["min_code"] is not a number, return failure.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">platform_version</var>["min_code"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["min_code"].

algorithms.name: process the platform version's release_type member
algorithms.html: To process the platform version's release_type member, given ordered map json and ordered map platform_version:

steps.html: If json["release_type"] does not exist, or if json["release_type"] is not a string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">platform_version</var>["release_type"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["release_type"].

algorithms.name: process the platform version's target_code member
algorithms.html: To process the platform version's target_code member, given ordered map json and ordered map platform_version:

steps.html: If json["target_code"] does not exist, or if json["target_code"] is not a number, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">platform_version</var>["target_code"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["target_code"].

algorithms.name: process the permission resource's name member
algorithms.html: To process the permission resource's name member, given ordered map json and ordered map permission:

steps.html:
If json["name"] does not exist, or
if json["name"] is not a string, or if json["name"] is the empty string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">permission</var>["name"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["name"].

algorithms.name: process the permission resource's reason member
algorithms.html: To process the permission resource's reason member, given ordered map json and ordered map permission:

steps.html:
If json["reason"] does not exist, or
if json["reason"] is not a string, or if json["reason"] is the empty string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">permission</var>["reason"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["reason"].

algorithms.name: process the version's code member
algorithms.html: To process the version's code member, given ordered map json and ordered map version:

steps.html: If json["code"] does not exist, or if json["code"] is not a number, return failure.
Let <var data-type="number">version</var> be a number, initially 1.

If json["code"] is greater than 0, then:
Set version to json["code"].
Set <var data-type="number">version</var>["code"] to <var data-type="number">version</var>.

algorithms.name: process the version's name member
algorithms.html: To process the version's name member, given ordered map json and ordered map version:

steps.html: If json["name"] does not exist, or if json["name"] is not a string, return failure.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">version</var>["name"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["name"].

algorithms.name: process the widget's name member
algorithms.html: To process the widget's name member, given ordered map json and ordered map widget:

steps.html: If json["name"] does not exist, or if json["name"] is not a string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">widget</var>["name"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["name"].

algorithms.name: process the widget's path member
algorithms.html: To process the widget's path member, given ordered map json and ordered map widget:

steps.html: If json["path"] does not exist, or if json["path"] is not a string, return.
Let url be the result of parsing json["path"].
If <var data-type="URL">url</var> is failure, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">widget</var>["path"] to <var data-type="URL">url</var>.

algorithms.name: process the widget's min_code member
algorithms.html: To process the widget's min_code member, given ordered map json, ordered map widget and ordered map manifest:

steps.html: Set <var data-type="ordered map">widget</var>["min_code"] to <var data-type="ordered map">manifest</var>["min_code"].
If json["min_code"] does not exist, or if json["min_code"] is not a string, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">widget</var>["min_code"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["min_code"].

algorithms.name: process the window's auto_design_width member
algorithms.html: To process the window's auto_design_width member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:

steps.html: If json["auto_design_width"] does not exist, or if json["auto_design_width"] is not a boolean, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">window</var>["auto_design_width"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["auto_design_width"].

algorithms.name: process the window's background_text_style member
algorithms.html: To process the window's background_text_style member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:

steps.html:
If json["background_text_style"] does not exist, or
if json["background_text_style"] is not a string, or
if json["background_text_style"] doesn't contain one of the background text style values, return.
Set <var data-type="ordered map">window</var>["background_text_style"] to <var data-type="ordered map">json</var>["background_text_style"].

algorithms.html: To process the window's design_width member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:

steps.html:
If json["design_width"] does not exist, or

algorithms.html: To process the window's enable_pull_down_refresh member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:

steps.html:
If json["enable_pull_down_refresh"] does not exist,

algorithms.html: To process the window's fullscreen member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:

algorithms.html: To process the window's navigation_bar_title_text member, given ordered map json and ordered map window:
